title: Comment on Glenn Frey’s Children: The Music Legend’s Family by Anonymous
text:
Glenn Frey’s Children: The Music Legend’s Family Published Updated 7:31 pm EST, January 18, 2016 12 Comments By Stephanie Dube Dwilson 6.5k Share Tweet Follow Glenn Frey had three children with his wife Cindy. (Getty) 
Glenn Frey has three children with his wife Cindy . Their children are daughter Taylor, 24, and sons Deacon, 22, and Otis, 13. Glenn kept mostly private about his children, but cherished them deeply. Here’s what you need to know. When Glenn Was in a TV Show, He Was Thankful To Be Home With His Children More Glenn was thankful to have more time with his children when he was part of a TV show instead of touring. (Getty) 
Glenn has kept mostly private about his family. But back in 1993, he mentioned to The Chicago Tribune that starring South of Sunset , a detective series on TV, gave him a chance to spend more time with his family, including then-infant son Deacon and Taylor who was 2 1/2. He was happy to not be touring when his children were so young, he said.
